markdownRemark.html: For roughly the past 5 years I have been working as a software developer. This role, to my mind, fully entails the act of writing, maintaining and, if you are lucky, deleting code. As I have mentioned in a previous post the thing that is, hopefully, occupying your thinking will be algorithms.

frontmatter.title: The most important thing a programmer does
